__e: Wait, we did what you asked, we got rid of the dragon.
Whoever this Dragon is, it's somebody they're scared of.
Remember, a dragon will always, always go for the kill.
I am the Dragon, and you call me insane!
He would become "form of a dragon" and I had to be something made of water, so I'd say "shape of an ice dragon."
And when a dragon and rider are truly one, and they see as one...
Once you've earned his loyalty... there is nothing a dragon won't do for you.
And as he died, so did his dragon. The last... except for the king's.
The boy loves his father and dreams of becoming like him.
